description: Submission of details of the storage and collection of commercial refuse, pursuant to Condition 10 of planning permission reference: 2018/02282/VAR dated 12th December 2018.Please note:The office has engaged First Mile as a waste carrier who are collecting waste and recycling bags on a daily basis. First Mile is a UK environmental and waste management business based in London. It works with businesses to reduce their climate impact through services such as waste and recycling.Due to waste pick-up scheduled on a daily basis, a bin store is currently not required. It can be constructed when needed.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
